limitActionsToCantrips.Label: Limit Actions to Cantrips
limitActionsToCantrips.Hint: Instead of showing all spells that deal damage in the Actions tab, limit it to only cantrips. This is the default D&DBeyond behavior.

expandedLimited.Label: Use Expanded Sheet as Limited
expandedLimited.Hint: Show the full character sheet for users who have the Limited permission for a given Actor.
